column4: I am new to linux, Ive just installed TeamSpeak 3 and I don't know where to find the shortcut icon to run it
Um I think you've installed a windows program :/
, c3l , no it's a linux program " Teamspeak"
I haven't heard of such a program for Linux
you've got apt-get, dpkg, or synaptic already open
well, I don't know. just tell me what to do to run this software
